channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: ggplot2
item.description: 做散点图，红色大小为4.使用了两层。 library(ggplot2) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggplot2': ## method from ## [.quosures rlang ## c.quosures rlang ## print.quosures rlang ggplot(airquality,aes(Wind,Temp)) + geom_point(col="red",alpha=0.4,size=4) 每个月份对应一个颜色，数据对应到颜色上面，需要加上aes函数 ggplot(airquality,aes(Wind,Temp)) + geom_point(aes(color=factor(Month)),alpha=0.4,size=5) ### Load the package or install if not present if (!require("RColorBrewer")) { install.packages("RColorBrewer") library(RColorBrewer) } ## 载入需要的程辑包：RColorBrewer ### Set the display a 1 by 1 grid par(mfrow=c(1,1)) ### Show all the colour schemes available display.brewer.all() 柱状图 name <- c("多","中","少","中","少") data <- data.

item.title: 函数查询
item.description: 豆瓣电影评分查询 library(RCurl) ## 载入需要的程辑包：bitops library(XML) movieScore <- function(x) { stopifnot(is.character(x)) search <- getForm("https://movie.douban.com/", search_text = x) searchweb <- htmlParse(search) resnodes <- getNodeSet(searchweb, "//div[@id='wrapper']//table[1]//a") if (is.null(resnodes)) return(NULL) else resurl <- xmlGetAttr(resnodes[[1]], name = "href") resweb <- getURL(resurl, .encoding = "UTF-8") content <- htmlParse(resweb, encoding = "UTF-8") resnodes <- getNodeSet(content, "//div[@id='interest_sectl']//p[@class='rating_self clearfix']//strong") namenodes <- getNodeSet(content, "//div[@id='content']//h1//span") score <- xmlValue(resnodes[[1]]) name <- xmlValue(namenodes[[1]]) return(list(name = name, score = score)) } movieScore("调音师") ## NULL

item.title: 爬虫豆瓣
DiagrammeR
item.description: R语言绘制流程图 R语言为用户提供了大量的绘图函数，包括基于图形语法的ggplot2和传统绘图包等。 R语言中基于低水平绘图设备（仅能绘制基本图形） library(grid) grid.roundrect(width=0.25, height=0.25) grid.text("四川大学") pushViewport(viewport(width=0.25,height=0.125)) grid.roundrect() grid.text("四川大学", x=unit(3,"mm"), y=unit(2,"lines"), just="left") grid.text("公共管理学院", x=unit(2,"mm"), y=unit(0.5,"lines"), just="left") popViewport() 通过R建立流程图 library(DiagrammeR) ## Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'ggplot2': ## method from ## [.quosures rlang ## c.quosures rlang ## print.quosures rlang grViz("digraph flowchart { # node definitions with substituted label text node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = rectangle] tab1 [label = '@@1'] tab2 [label = '@@2'] tab3 [label = '@@3'] tab4 [label = '@@4'] tab5 [label = '@@5'] # edge definitions with the node IDs tab1 -> tab2 -> tab3 -> tab4 -> tab5; } [1]: '七点半起床' [2]: '八点出门吃早餐' [3]: '八点二十到图书馆开始学习' [4]: '十二点离开图书馆吃饭并午休半小时' [5]: '下午继续学习' ") {"

item.title: food
item.description: 肥宅快乐水 肥宅快乐水，网络流行词，该词指的是“可乐”，而被称为“肥宅快乐水”是因为它可以给肥宅群体带来快乐，并且可以让肥宅保持真正的肥宅必备的属性“肥”。 海底捞火锅 太喜欢吃海底捞啦，上周去体验了一下财富中心店的海底捞，还是一如既往的好吃😊点了一个双人套餐，然后加了半份肥牛，还没有吃完。午餐肉好好吃，扯面好好玩，番茄汤好好喝😁最后还送了我两包火锅底料，开心

item.title: 政府报告爬虫
A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
